comments:

Were there anyother exceptions in your .log file related to the launch dialog. 
Looking at the code path, it appears the launch dialog was already open, when 
a second request was made to open the dialog. It looks like the first instance 
of the dialog may not have closed properly.
Marking as works for me, unless you can provide steps to reproduce.
